bullet: Hi! I'm a developer based in Mexico City.
born: I was born in 1998 in Mexico City
2019: While I was studying at the university, I started working as a freelance developer.
2020: I graduated from the university with a bachelor's degree in Information Technology, and also started working as a frontend developer at GQC in Mexico City.
2021: I started working as a freelance frontend developer.
2022: I started working as fullstack developer for a SOFIPO in Mexico and Bolivia.
Now: I work as a fullstack developer utilizing different technologies and adapting to the needs of each project.
work: I specialize in utilizing Angular and .NET Core to create high-performance and user-friendly applications. I also have some experience in backend technologies such as AWS, GCP, and MongoDB.
